name: Dooter's Adventure
description: All was well in the land of Dootville until Dooter had his 12th birthday party, during his party the evil Dootian Melvin infiltraited and stole Dooter's cake and his gifts before unleashing his minions upon Dootville. Dooter must put a stop to Melvin's evil actions and retrieve his cake and gifts in order to continue his party.
